name: Sudoku Jogatina HD
description:
The Sudoku app for iPad!

Download now Sudoku and discover what everybody already knows: Jogatina's quality is unmatched.

You deserve to have more fun!
And the best part is: IT’S FREE!
Accept the challenge, download now.

*****

- Play WITH NO LIMITS! You can Play as many times as you want.
- Special Hints and Tips to help you win and improve your habilities
- Undo Button. Here you can learn while playing!
- Classic or advanced: choose your difficulty level!

*****

Install Sudoku now on your iPad!


Play now!!
